title: ncETH Vault
subTitle: Deposit WETH in exchange for ncETH and earn protocol fees.

YourStats.title: Your Stats
YourStats.totalValueTip: Total value of your ncETH, denominated in WETH.
YourStats.estimatedEarningsTip: Calculated based on current market value of ncETH holdings and the total WETH deposited and withdrawn.

withdraw.feeTip: Withdrawal incurs a fee of 0.3%, which will be added to the backstop pool to mitigate potential losses in the vault.

stats.apyTip: Calculated using the data from the past 7 days, projected to a year.
stats.ncETHTip: ncETH accumulates options premiums in real time.
